What is Investfit?

Investfit enables advisers to find the best investment strategy for their clients and at the same time provide full financial projections taking into account investment risk.

It is easy to use, quick and engaging and helps advisers show their clients how the recommended investment strategy will meet their goals with a level of risk they can tolerate. Investfit's system can be customised to meet the unique needs of your business"
